idea-plugin.name: Exception Guard
idea-plugin.description:
Exception Guard helps you write safer code by detecting potential exceptions in your Java and Kotlin methods.

Features:

  • 🔍 Smart Detection: Automatically detects methods that can throw exceptions
  • ⚠️ Visual Warnings: Highlights risky method calls with clear warnings
  • 🛠️ Quick Fixes: Provides automatic try-catch generation and exception handling suggestions
  • 📋 Exception Documentation: Shows which exceptions can be thrown and why
  • 🎯 Context Awareness: Smart analysis based on method signatures and implementations
  • ⚡ Real-time Analysis: Instant feedback while you code

Supported Languages:

  • ☕ Java
  • 🏗️ Kotlin

Never miss a potential exception again! Exception Guard keeps your code robust and your applications stable.

Perfect for developers who want to write defensive, exception-safe code.
